akn:section.akn:heading: Availability of appropriations for uniforms or allowances

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1471h. Availability of appropriations for uniforms or allowances Appropriations available to the Department of the Interior for salaries and expenses shall on and after December 8, 2004, be available for uniforms or allowances therefor, as authorized by law (5 U.S.C. 5901–5902 and D.C. Code 4–204). (Pub. L. 108–447, div. E, title I, § 105, Dec. 8, 2004, 118 Stat. 3063.)
